alert.note: Alert for Northern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 12:23PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Liberty County through 100 PM CDT... At 1223 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Hardin, or 11 miles southwest of Thicket, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Liberty, Daisetta, Hardin, Kenefick, Dayton Lakes, Moss Hill, Romayor and Rye. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
